settings.sub-custom-go-text: We've Got Your Back. Let’s Chat.
settings.sub-custom-go-desp: Whether it's a quick repair, an installation, or finding the perfect solution for your home, we're here to make it simple. No stress, no upselling, just honest help from a team that's as committed to your comfort as you are

settings.sub-cust-contact-desp: Questions? Email us at care@golime.com and we'll get back to you fast - no hassle, just answers.

settings.sub-cust-contact-text: Help is Just a Call Away
settings.sub-cust-contact-desp: Need quick answers? Call us at  +1 877-747-8292, and we'll make your home comfort journey effortless.
For immediate assistance, reach out to us. Our team is ready to help you with any questions or concerns.

settings.sub-cust-form-text: Need a hand?We’re here to help.
settings.sub-cust-form-desp: To receive assistance, please complete the form below. Our dedicated team is here to help you every step of the way.
settings.sub-cust-form-des: *By signing up, you agree to receive emails from Go Lime. You can unsubscribe anytime. Visit our Privacy Policy & Website Terms of Use for details.

settings.sub-social-link-des: Stay updated on our journey towards sustainable living by following us on our social media channels.
